author: bayard
msg: Removed a handful of methods which took overloaded String values for integers.
Allowing such code as: Strings.repeat("5") which called on to Strings.repeat(5).

author: bayard
msg: Made it so a CharRange can be a single "-" character.

author: bayard
msg: Null protection added to the strip methods. Also a bug fixed in which
the strip methods would not handle "    ".
Added a stripAll method which runs strip on each element in an array.

author: bayard
msg: The random methods return the same value within the same millisecond due
to the methods creating a new Random object each time. I've pulled out the
Random object and made it static so it can be reused.
